pr_title: Update return and throws javadoc for SyncSession::update

timeline.message: Update return and throws javadoc for SyncSession::update

timeline.bodyText: Is it preferable to use an explicit import or to use a fully qualified class name in the JavaDoc instead?
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText: I have never discussed this with anyone, but I prefer it this way.
replies.author: hakonhall
